019
020import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.paste.IPasteClient;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.paste.IPasteable;
022import org.json.JSONArray;
023import org.json.JSONObject;
024
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.io.OutputStream;
027import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
028import java.net.URL;
029import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.Scanner;
032
033/**
034 * PasteeClient
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 1.0.0.2
038 */
039public class PasteeClient implements IPasteClient {
040
041  private static final String PASTEEE_API_URL = "https://api.paste.ee/v1/pastes";
042  private final String apiKey;
043
044  public PasteeClient(final String apiKey) {
045
046    this.apiKey = apiKey;
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public String identifier() {
051
052    return "paste.ee";
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  public String endpoint() {
057
058    return PASTEEE_API_URL;
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public String apiKey() {
063
064    return apiKey;
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public Optional<String> createSingle(final IPasteable pasteable) {
069
070    return createBatchPaste(pasteable);
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public Optional<String> createMultiple(final IPasteable... pasteables) {
075
076    return createBatchPaste(pasteables);
077  }
078
079  private Optional<String> createBatchPaste(final IPasteable... pasteables) {
080
081    try {
082      final JSONObject requestBody = new JSONObject();
083      requestBody.put("description", "Batch Paste");
084
085      final JSONArray sectionsArray = new JSONArray();
086      for(final IPasteable pasteable : pasteables) {
087
088        final JSONObject section = new JSONObject();
089        section.put("name", pasteable.fileName() + "." + pasteable.extension());
090        section.put("syntax", pasteable.syntax());
091        section.put("contents", pasteable.content());
092        sectionsArray.put(section);
093      }
094
095      requestBody.put("sections", sectionsArray);
096
097      final HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection)new URL(PASTEEE_API_URL).openConnection();
098      connection.setRequestMethod("POST");
099      connection.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json");
100      connection.setRequestProperty("X-Auth-Token", apiKey);
101      connection.setDoOutput(true);
102
103      try(final OutputStream os = connection.getOutputStream()) {
104
105        os.write(requestBody.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
106      }
107
108      try(final Scanner scanner = new Scanner(connection.getInputStream(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
109
110        final String response = scanner.useDelimiter("\\A").next();
111        final JSONObject jsonResponse = new JSONObject(response);
112
113        return Optional.of(jsonResponse.getString("link"));
114      }
115    } catch(final IOException e) {
116
117      e.printStackTrace();
118      return Optional.empty();
119    }
120  }
121}
